subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After Darren O’Day’s two and two-thirds scoreless innings in Thursday’s 2-1 win, Baltimore could make the case that the reliever has been their most valuable player of the postseason.
snippet: After Darren O’Day’s two and two-thirds scoreless innings in Thursday’s 2-1 win, Baltimore could make the case that the reliever has been their most valuable player of the postseason.
